Articles.Content:
I sometimes accidently double click Kerbin, and I see a "target Kerbin" message. My camera is then centered on the planet.

I cant seem to deselect it by double clicking my ship or any other bodies or ships. The only solution I've found thus far is to restart the game.

Does anyone know how to de-select bodies?
press the tab key. You will get back to your craft eventually.

press the tab key. You will get back to your craft eventually.

This doesn't seem to work for me

I have the same issue as the OP.

Thanks what-the, Tab works.

Edited August 27, 2012 by nhnifong

This doesn't seem to work for me

I have the same issue as the OP.

Well try again Tab is the only key that can cycle through planets/your craft, as double-clicking can only focus another planet/moon.
I use [ and ], and they work perfectly...

These keys only work to switch between ships/debris. The problem here was to unfocus Kerbin/the Mun/Minmus in map view, so the Tab key is the one to try.

Well of course, you can switch to another ship and back, but that would be a waste of time.
